name: CircleCircles
description:
Game for Windows 64bits Extra Credits Game Jam #3

THEME: CYCLES

Circle Circles is a game about circles.

-o-0-o-

Start Menu: Click "Enter a name" area and enter your name with the keyboard

Gameplay: The more squares you transform into circles the better your score!

[Please try version 2 first] Gameplay v1: Use the cheat button to transform the current square (centered on screen) into a circle

Gameplay v2: While pressing Left Mouse Button, draw circles with your mouse around the current square (centered on screen) to transform the square into a circle

End Menu: You can toggle the Top Scores by clicking the "Top Scores" button

-o-0-o-

Versions

v2c: Several back office debug, minor audio and visual polish

v2b: More visual polish, audio

v2a: Mouse control, limited visual polish, no audio

v1: Basic gameplay, no mouse control, no audio, no visual polish

-o-0-o-

Credits

Designed and  develop in solo by Stephan Gimenez

Pre-made assets used (CircleCircles_v1):

  • Post-process shader pack v1 by Tom Shannon LLC: occluded hexagonal post-processing material

Pre-made assets used (CircleCircles_v2):

  • Post-process shader pack v1 by Tom Shannon LLC: modification of a post-process depth-occluded hexagonal material into a regular material (applied to the floor)
  • Unreal Engine free assets: a sunflare texture and a ribbon material both used in a particle system (FX showing mouse path)
